page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: The Post Office is the only shop in the village.It provides a service to Hanging Houghton as well as Lamport. The postman delivers the newspapers as well as the post.His wife keeps a very small stock of other goods of great variety because the shop is so small.When she delivers the mail,she collects shopping lists from the old people who live in the cottages and once a week she goes into Northampton and buys the things they have asked for. The milkman doesnot just deliver the milk.He takes medical prescriptions from the doctor's surgery and changes their library books.
